Text saved: Sometimes bridges fall down and people do not know why. Engineers study the problem to understand the reason. Sometimes, this happens because they used bad material to build the bridge. Or it happens because there was a problem with an important part of the bridge. In other cases, they built the bridge to hold a specific weight. It could not hold more weight than that.
